alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Campbell; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 26 at 11:18AM EST until March 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers... Ohio River at Maysville. Ohio River at Meldahl Dam. Ohio River at Cincinnati. Ohio River at Portsmouth. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Ohio River at Meldahl Dam. * WHEN...From this morning to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 49.0 feet, Lowland flooding near the river occurs, as well as backwater flooding in southern Clermont and Brown Counties in Ohio and Bracken County in Kentucky. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Saturday the stage was 44.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 49.2 feet Monday evening. - Action stage is 49.0 feet. - Flood stage is 51.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
